sidebar.no-top-donor-description: Become a supporter to unlock exclusive benefits!

home.welcome: Welcome to the official MinestoreCMS Webstore!
home.welcome-description: To begin shopping, please select a category from the sidebar. Please note that ranks cost a one-time fee and are permanent.
home.paypal-balance-banks-all-credit-debit-ca: PayPal balance, Banks, All Credit/Debit Cards
home.support-or-questions-description: Need any questions answered before checkout? Waited more than 20 minutes but your package hasn't arrived? Ask the community or staff on our Discord server! We're here to help you out.
home.refund-policy-description: We have a strict no-refund policy. All purchases are final and non-refundable. Please make sure you are purchasing the correct item before checking out.
home.payment-processing: It could take up to 15 minutes for your purchase to be processed. If you are still not credited after 15 minutes, please contact our support team on Discord.

auth.title: Log In
auth.label: Username
auth.description: To start shopping, please enter your Minecraft Username
auth.check-in-game: Please, check a chat & verify yourself on the Minecraft Server!
auth.confirm: You need to confirm that you are the owner of the account!
auth.wait-before-resend: Wait 10 seconds before sending it again...

checkout.title: Checkout
checkout.name: Name
checkout.this-item-is-popular-among-us-customers: This item is popular among us customers. Give it a try!
checkout.empty-cart-description: Looks like there is nothing in your cart at the moment. Take a moment to explore our store and discover amazing in-game items, ranks, and more! When you find something you like, simply add it to your cart and proceed to checkout.
checkout.privacy-statement-description: All payments are final and non-refundable. Attempting a chargeback or opening a PayPal dispute will result in permanent and irreversible banishment from all of our servers, and other minecraft stores.
checkout.agree: I agree to the terms & conditions of this purchase.
checkout.only-one-coupon: You can only redeem one coupon and one gift card at a time

notifications.not-all-detail-fields-are-filled-in: Not all detail fields are filled in!
notifications.subscription-item-should-be-alone-in-the: Subscription item should be alone in the cart!

footer.not-affiliated: We are not affiliated with Mojang AB.
footer.description: is a Minecraft: Java Edition network that provides players with captivating and unique gameplay. This is the only official store for the network.

success.title: THANK YOU!
success.thanks: Thank you so much for supporting our servers network!
success.thanks-title-1: Thank you for supporting our servers network!
success.thanks-description: Thanks to you, we can pay for our servers, hire developers and keep working on making our servers are better and better each day!
success.you-will-receive: You will receive your rank and/or packages within approximately 30 minutes.
success.thanks-description-2: If you do not receive your items within this timeframe, please contact us with your username and attached proof of purchase. Also make sure that you have submitted your correct Minecraft username. If this is not the case, please mention this.

error.somethingWrong: Something went wrong or our servers are offline!
error.youreTheBest: You're the best, but something happened ðŸ¥º
error.contactUs: Please, contact us at Discord or any other way!
error.serverIssue: Probably our servers are offline or something happened with your payment.
error.contactWithProof: Please contact us with your username and attached proof of purchase.
error.paymentIssue: Maybe your payment marked as 'pending'. Also make sure that you have submitted your correct Minecraft username. If this is not the case, please mention this.

actions.reached-stock-limit: You've reached the limit for this item!
actions.cant-mix-normal-and-subscription: You can't mix normal items with subscription items!
actions.cant-add-more-than-one-subscription: You can't add more than one subscription to the cart!

sepayModal.paymentReferenceNote: Please keep the payment %code% reference to help our system automatically confirm your payment.
